entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is the nurse who insisted on keeping Harry in the hospital wing for the rest of the weekend. She is described as being insistent and caring towards Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who has been injured and is recovering in the hospital wing. He is described as feeling sad about losing his Nimbus Two Thousand broomstick.

entities.name: nimbus two thousand
entities.description: The Nimbus Two Thousand is Harry's broken broomstick that he refuses to let Madam Pomfrey throw away. It is described as being beyond repair.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts who sent Harry a bunch of earwiggy flowers to cheer him up. He is described as being kind and thoughtful towards Harry.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is Ron's sister who visited Harry with a get-well card she made herself. She is described as blushing furiously when giving the card to Harry.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is one of Harry's best friends who visited him in the hospital wing along with Hermione. He is described as being supportive and caring towards Harry.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is one of Harry's best friends who visited him in the hospital wing along with Ron. She is described as being supportive and caring towards Harry.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a Quidditch coach who visited Harry in the hospital wing on Sunday morning. He is described as having a hollow and dead sort of voice when speaking to Harry.
